_sText:
This is my first css map.

It is a small but fun gungame map made for 18 players. It is still in it's alpha version. I'm currently working on adding more things to it such as bridges and expanding it adding more structures and such. there are some problems with how the blocks are aligned but i will fix those in future releases.

It has a pit of death in the middle of the map were it looks like water but if you fall in you slowly die and it has 2 forts near the top of the map and multiple ways of getting around like ramps and ladders.


Place in your C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\yoursteamname\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
